\input{tex/preamble.tex}
\input{tex/glossary.tex}
\input{tex/nomenclature.tex}

\makeatletter
\def\BState{\State\hskip-\ALG@thistlm}
\makeatother

\begin{document}
	%% Titlepage generated by DAIM
	
	\input{tex/dedication.tex}		%% Optional
	
	\clearpage
	\pagenumbering{roman}
	\setcounter{page}{1}
	
	\input{tex/abstract.tex}
	
	\input{tex/sammendrag.tex} %Abstract in norwegian
	
	\input{tex/preface.tex}
	
	\glsresetall
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Table of Contents} 
	\tableofcontents \clearpage
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{List of Tables}
	\listoftables \clearpage
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{List of Figures}
	\listoffigures \clearpage
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Glossary}
	\printglossary \clearpage
	
	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Acronyms}		
	\printglossary[type=\acronymtype,nopostdot] \clearpage

	\addcontentsline{toc}{chapter}{Nomenclature}
	\printnomenclature[2.5 cm]  \clearpage 

	\pagenumbering{arabic}	
	\input{tex/chapter-introduction_background.tex} \clearpage 
	\input{tex/chapter-methods.tex} \clearpage 
	\input{tex/chapter-results.tex} \clearpage 
	\input{tex/chapter-discussion_conclusion.tex} \clearpage  
	\input{tex/chapter-appendices.tex} \clearpage
	\addcontentsline{toc}{section}{Bibliography}
	\bibliographystyle{ieeetr}
	\bibliography{MHTbib}
\end{document}
